friendly_title.en: Sorry, we were not able to log you in

friendly_description.en: What is the problem? %IDPNAME% does not return a persistent identifier to help us uniquely identify you.

resolution_description.en: What can you do? At the moment, the only way to log in is to use a different account. For future use, you may ask your institution administrator to release the required information, by sending them a print screen of this error, or asking them to contact our support at support@example.org.

details_description.en: Your identity provider needs to release any of the following user identifiers to help us uniquely identify you:

go2disco.en: Log in with a different account
